divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking straight up at the stars on my porch, I couldn't sleep and the stars were extra bright. At 2:47 AM a bright flash like the flash from an old time flash bulb happened, what seemed maybe 50 yards away, at 12:00 high to me. I looked for aircraft, there was nothing. I thought it was the strobe from a passing airplane, but there was no sound or any additional flashes, just that one. After realizing what I had seen was unexplainable, I sat down and filled this report
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Arlington
There was one other sighting in Arlington on or around August 15th 2010
